name: BitStarters
description: BitStarters is a fully decentralized multichain protocol for launching innovative web3 projects. With BitStarters, decentralized projects can raise capital, build fast, connect with community of web3 enthusiasts, and receive long-term operational, strategic, and technical support. Users of the platform will gain early access to top projects building on dominant and emerging blockchains.
